+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| Name      | Descripti | Type      | Default   | Valid     | Importanc |
|           | on        |           |           | Values    | e         |
+===========+===========+===========+===========+===========+===========+
| config.st | The name  | string    |           |           | high      |
| orage.top | of the    |           |           |           |           |
| ic        | Kafka     |           |           |           |           |
|           | topic     |           |           |           |           |
|           | where     |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | configura |           |           |           |           |
|           | tions     |           |           |           |           |
|           | are       |           |           |           |           |
|           | stored    |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| group.id  | A unique  | string    |           |           | high      |
|           | string    |           |           |           |           |
|           | that      |           |           |           |           |
|           | identifie |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | Connect   |           |           |           |           |
|           | cluster   |           |           |           |           |
|           | group     |           |           |           |           |
|           | this      |           |           |           |           |
|           | worker    |           |           |           |           |
|           | belongs   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to.       |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| key.conve | Converter | class     |           |           | high      |
| rter      | class     |           |           |           |           |
|           | used to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | convert   |           |           |           |           |
|           | between   |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka     |           |           |           |           |
|           | Connect   |           |           |           |           |
|           | format    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and the   |           |           |           |           |
|           | serialize |           |           |           |           |
|           | d         |           |           |           |           |
|           | form that |           |           |           |           |
|           | is        |           |           |           |           |
|           | written   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to Kafka. |           |           |           |           |
|           | This      |           |           |           |           |
|           | controls  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | format of |           |           |           |           |
|           | the keys  |           |           |           |           |
|           | in        |           |           |           |           |
|           | messages  |           |           |           |           |
|           | written   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to or     |           |           |           |           |
|           | read from |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and since |           |           |           |           |
|           | this is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | independe |           |           |           |           |
|           | nt        |           |           |           |           |
|           | of        |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | it allows |           |           |           |           |
|           | any       |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | to work   |           |           |           |           |
|           | with any  |           |           |           |           |
|           | serializa |           |           |           |           |
|           | tion      |           |           |           |           |
|           | format.   |           |           |           |           |
|           | Examples  |           |           |           |           |
|           | of common |           |           |           |           |
|           | formats   |           |           |           |           |
|           | include   |           |           |           |           |
|           | JSON and  |           |           |           |           |
|           | Avro.     |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| offset.st | The name  | string    |           |           | high      |
| orage.top | of the    |           |           |           |           |
| ic        | Kafka     |           |           |           |           |
|           | topic     |           |           |           |           |
|           | where     |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | offsets   |           |           |           |           |
|           | are       |           |           |           |           |
|           | stored    |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| status.st | The name  | string    |           |           | high      |
| orage.top | of the    |           |           |           |           |
| ic        | Kafka     |           |           |           |           |
|           | topic     |           |           |           |           |
|           | where     |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | and task  |           |           |           |           |
|           | status    |           |           |           |           |
|           | are       |           |           |           |           |
|           | stored    |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| value.con | Converter | class     |           |           | high      |
| verter    | class     |           |           |           |           |
|           | used to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | convert   |           |           |           |           |
|           | between   |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka     |           |           |           |           |
|           | Connect   |           |           |           |           |
|           | format    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and the   |           |           |           |           |
|           | serialize |           |           |           |           |
|           | d         |           |           |           |           |
|           | form that |           |           |           |           |
|           | is        |           |           |           |           |
|           | written   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to Kafka. |           |           |           |           |
|           | This      |           |           |           |           |
|           | controls  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | format of |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | values in |           |           |           |           |
|           | messages  |           |           |           |           |
|           | written   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to or     |           |           |           |           |
|           | read from |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and since |           |           |           |           |
|           | this is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | independe |           |           |           |           |
|           | nt        |           |           |           |           |
|           | of        |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | it allows |           |           |           |           |
|           | any       |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | to work   |           |           |           |           |
|           | with any  |           |           |           |           |
|           | serializa |           |           |           |           |
|           | tion      |           |           |           |           |
|           | format.   |           |           |           |           |
|           | Examples  |           |           |           |           |
|           | of common |           |           |           |           |
|           | formats   |           |           |           |           |
|           | include   |           |           |           |           |
|           | JSON and  |           |           |           |           |
|           | Avro.     |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| internal. | Converter | class     |           |           | low       |
| key.conve | class     |           |           |           |           |
| rter      | used to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | convert   |           |           |           |           |
|           | between   |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka     |           |           |           |           |
|           | Connect   |           |           |           |           |
|           | format    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and the   |           |           |           |           |
|           | serialize |           |           |           |           |
|           | d         |           |           |           |           |
|           | form that |           |           |           |           |
|           | is        |           |           |           |           |
|           | written   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to Kafka. |           |           |           |           |
|           | This      |           |           |           |           |
|           | controls  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | format of |           |           |           |           |
|           | the keys  |           |           |           |           |
|           | in        |           |           |           |           |
|           | messages  |           |           |           |           |
|           | written   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to or     |           |           |           |           |
|           | read from |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and since |           |           |           |           |
|           | this is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | independe |           |           |           |           |
|           | nt        |           |           |           |           |
|           | of        |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | it allows |           |           |           |           |
|           | any       |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | to work   |           |           |           |           |
|           | with any  |           |           |           |           |
|           | serializa |           |           |           |           |
|           | tion      |           |           |           |           |
|           | format.   |           |           |           |           |
|           | Examples  |           |           |           |           |
|           | of common |           |           |           |           |
|           | formats   |           |           |           |           |
|           | include   |           |           |           |           |
|           | JSON and  |           |           |           |           |
|           | Avro.     |           |           |           |           |
|           | This      |           |           |           |           |
|           | setting   |           |           |           |           |
|           | controls  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | format    |           |           |           |           |
|           | used for  |           |           |           |           |
|           | internal  |           |           |           |           |
|           | bookkeepi |           |           |           |           |
|           | ng        |           |           |           |           |
|           | data used |           |           |           |           |
|           | by the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | framework |           |           |           |           |
|           | ,         |           |           |           |           |
|           | such as   |           |           |           |           |
|           | configs   |           |           |           |           |
|           | and       |           |           |           |           |
|           | offsets,  |           |           |           |           |
|           | so users  |           |           |           |           |
|           | can       |           |           |           |           |
|           | typically |           |           |           |           |
|           | use any   |           |           |           |           |
|           | functioni |           |           |           |           |
|           | ng        |           |           |           |           |
|           | Converter |           |           |           |           |
|           | implement |           |           |           |           |
|           | ation.    |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| internal. | Converter | class     |           |           | low       |
| value.con | class     |           |           |           |           |
| verter    | used to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | convert   |           |           |           |           |
|           | between   |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka     |           |           |           |           |
|           | Connect   |           |           |           |           |
|           | format    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and the   |           |           |           |           |
|           | serialize |           |           |           |           |
|           | d         |           |           |           |           |
|           | form that |           |           |           |           |
|           | is        |           |           |           |           |
|           | written   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to Kafka. |           |           |           |           |
|           | This      |           |           |           |           |
|           | controls  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | format of |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | values in |           |           |           |           |
|           | messages  |           |           |           |           |
|           | written   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to or     |           |           |           |           |
|           | read from |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and since |           |           |           |           |
|           | this is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | independe |           |           |           |           |
|           | nt        |           |           |           |           |
|           | of        |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | it allows |           |           |           |           |
|           | any       |           |           |           |           |
|           | connector |           |           |           |           |
|           | to work   |           |           |           |           |
|           | with any  |           |           |           |           |
|           | serializa |           |           |           |           |
|           | tion      |           |           |           |           |
|           | format.   |           |           |           |           |
|           | Examples  |           |           |           |           |
|           | of common |           |           |           |           |
|           | formats   |           |           |           |           |
|           | include   |           |           |           |           |
|           | JSON and  |           |           |           |           |
|           | Avro.     |           |           |           |           |
|           | This      |           |           |           |           |
|           | setting   |           |           |           |           |
|           | controls  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | format    |           |           |           |           |
|           | used for  |           |           |           |           |
|           | internal  |           |           |           |           |
|           | bookkeepi |           |           |           |           |
|           | ng        |           |           |           |           |
|           | data used |           |           |           |           |
|           | by the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | framework |           |           |           |           |
|           | ,         |           |           |           |           |
|           | such as   |           |           |           |           |
|           | configs   |           |           |           |           |
|           | and       |           |           |           |           |
|           | offsets,  |           |           |           |           |
|           | so users  |           |           |           |           |
|           | can       |           |           |           |           |
|           | typically |           |           |           |           |
|           | use any   |           |           |           |           |
|           | functioni |           |           |           |           |
|           | ng        |           |           |           |           |
|           | Converter |           |           |           |           |
|           | implement |           |           |           |           |
|           | ation.    |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| bootstrap | A list of | list      | localhost |           | high      |
| .servers  | host/port |           | :9092     |           |           |
|           | pairs to  |           |           |           |           |
|           | use for   |           |           |           |           |
|           | establish |           |           |           |           |
|           | ing       |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | initial   |           |           |           |           |
|           | connectio |           |           |           |           |
|           | n         |           |           |           |           |
|           | to the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka     |           |           |           |           |
|           | cluster.  |           |           |           |           |
|           | The       |           |           |           |           |
|           | client    |           |           |           |           |
|           | will make |           |           |           |           |
|           | use of    |           |           |           |           |
|           | all       |           |           |           |           |
|           | servers   |           |           |           |           |
|           | irrespect |           |           |           |           |
|           | ive       |           |           |           |           |
|           | of which  |           |           |           |           |
|           | servers   |           |           |           |           |
|           | are       |           |           |           |           |
|           | specified |           |           |           |           |
|           | here for  |           |           |           |           |
|           | bootstrap |           |           |           |           |
|           | pingâ€”this |           |           |           |           |
|           | list only |           |           |           |           |
|           | impacts   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | initial   |           |           |           |           |
|           | hosts     |           |           |           |           |
|           | used to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | discover  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the full  |           |           |           |           |
|           | set of    |           |           |           |           |
|           | servers.  |           |           |           |           |
|           | This list |           |           |           |           |
|           | should be |           |           |           |           |
|           | in the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | form      |           |           |           |           |
|           | ``host1:p |           |           |           |           |
|           | ort1,host |           |           |           |           |
|           | 2:port2,. |           |           |           |           |
|           | ..``.     |           |           |           |           |
|           | Since     |           |           |           |           |
|           | these     |           |           |           |           |
|           | servers   |           |           |           |           |
|           | are just  |           |           |           |           |
|           | used for  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | initial   |           |           |           |           |
|           | connectio |           |           |           |           |
|           | n         |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | discover  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the full  |           |           |           |           |
|           | cluster   |           |           |           |           |
|           | membershi |           |           |           |           |
|           | p         |           |           |           |           |
|           | (which    |           |           |           |           |
|           | may       |           |           |           |           |
|           | change    |           |           |           |           |
|           | dynamical |           |           |           |           |
|           | ly),      |           |           |           |           |
|           | this list |           |           |           |           |
|           | need not  |           |           |           |           |
|           | contain   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the full  |           |           |           |           |
|           | set of    |           |           |           |           |
|           | servers   |           |           |           |           |
|           | (you may  |           |           |           |           |
|           | want more |           |           |           |           |
|           | than one, |           |           |           |           |
|           | though,   |           |           |           |           |
|           | in case a |           |           |           |           |
|           | server is |           |           |           |           |
|           | down).    |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| heartbeat | The       | int       | 3000      |           | high      |
| .interval | expected  |           |           |           |           |
| .ms       | time      |           |           |           |           |
|           | between   |           |           |           |           |
|           | heartbeat |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | to the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | group     |           |           |           |           |
|           | coordinat |           |           |           |           |
|           | or        |           |           |           |           |
|           | when      |           |           |           |           |
|           | using     |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka's   |           |           |           |           |
|           | group     |           |           |           |           |
|           | managemen |           |           |           |           |
|           | t         |           |           |           |           |
|           | facilitie |           |           |           |           |
|           | s.        |           |           |           |           |
|           | Heartbeat |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | are used  |           |           |           |           |
|           | to ensure |           |           |           |           |
|           | that the  |           |           |           |           |
|           | worker's  |           |           |           |           |
|           | session   |           |           |           |           |
|           | stays     |           |           |           |           |
|           | active    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and to    |           |           |           |           |
|           | facilitat |           |           |           |           |
|           | e         |           |           |           |           |
|           | rebalanci |           |           |           |           |
|           | ng        |           |           |           |           |
|           | when new  |           |           |           |           |
|           | members   |           |           |           |           |
|           | join or   |           |           |           |           |
|           | leave the |           |           |           |           |
|           | group.    |           |           |           |           |
|           | The value |           |           |           |           |
|           | must be   |           |           |           |           |
|           | set lower |           |           |           |           |
|           | than      |           |           |           |           |
|           | ``session |           |           |           |           |
|           | .timeout. |           |           |           |           |
|           | ms``,     |           |           |           |           |
|           | but       |           |           |           |           |
|           | typically |           |           |           |           |
|           | should be |           |           |           |           |
|           | set no    |           |           |           |           |
|           | higher    |           |           |           |           |
|           | than 1/3  |           |           |           |           |
|           | of that   |           |           |           |           |
|           | value. It |           |           |           |           |
|           | can be    |           |           |           |           |
|           | adjusted  |           |           |           |           |
|           | even      |           |           |           |           |
|           | lower to  |           |           |           |           |
|           | control   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | expected  |           |           |           |           |
|           | time for  |           |           |           |           |
|           | normal    |           |           |           |           |
|           | rebalance |           |           |           |           |
|           | s.        |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| rebalance | The       | int       | 60000     |           | high      |
| .timeout. | maximum   |           |           |           |           |
| ms        | allowed   |           |           |           |           |
|           | time for  |           |           |           |           |
|           | each      |           |           |           |           |
|           | worker to |           |           |           |           |
|           | join the  |           |           |           |           |
|           | group     |           |           |           |           |
|           | once a    |           |           |           |           |
|           | rebalance |           |           |           |           |
|           | has       |           |           |           |           |
|           | begun.    |           |           |           |           |
|           | This is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | basically |           |           |           |           |
|           | a limit   |           |           |           |           |
|           | on the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | amount of |           |           |           |           |
|           | time      |           |           |           |           |
|           | needed    |           |           |           |           |
|           | for all   |           |           |           |           |
|           | tasks to  |           |           |           |           |
|           | flush any |           |           |           |           |
|           | pending   |           |           |           |           |
|           | data and  |           |           |           |           |
|           | commit    |           |           |           |           |
|           | offsets.  |           |           |           |           |
|           | If the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | timeout   |           |           |           |           |
|           | is        |           |           |           |           |
|           | exceeded, |           |           |           |           |
|           | then the  |           |           |           |           |
|           | worker    |           |           |           |           |
|           | will be   |           |           |           |           |
|           | removed   |           |           |           |           |
|           | from the  |           |           |           |           |
|           | group,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | which     |           |           |           |           |
|           | will      |           |           |           |           |
|           | cause     |           |           |           |           |
|           | offset    |           |           |           |           |
|           | commit    |           |           |           |           |
|           | failures. |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| session.t | The       | int       | 10000     |           | high      |
| imeout.ms | timeout   |           |           |           |           |
|           | used to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | detect    |           |           |           |           |
|           | worker    |           |           |           |           |
|           | failures. |           |           |           |           |
|           | The       |           |           |           |           |
|           | worker    |           |           |           |           |
|           | sends     |           |           |           |           |
|           | periodic  |           |           |           |           |
|           | heartbeat |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | indicate  |           |           |           |           |
|           | its       |           |           |           |           |
|           | liveness  |           |           |           |           |
|           | to the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | broker.   |           |           |           |           |
|           | If no     |           |           |           |           |
|           | heartbeat |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | are       |           |           |           |           |
|           | received  |           |           |           |           |
|           | by the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | broker    |           |           |           |           |
|           | before    |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | expiratio |           |           |           |           |
|           | n         |           |           |           |           |
|           | of this   |           |           |           |           |
|           | session   |           |           |           |           |
|           | timeout,  |           |           |           |           |
|           | then the  |           |           |           |           |
|           | broker    |           |           |           |           |
|           | will      |           |           |           |           |
|           | remove    |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | worker    |           |           |           |           |
|           | from the  |           |           |           |           |
|           | group and |           |           |           |           |
|           | initiate  |           |           |           |           |
|           | a         |           |           |           |           |
|           | rebalance |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |
|           | Note that |           |           |           |           |
|           | the value |           |           |           |           |
|           | must be   |           |           |           |           |
|           | in the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | allowable |           |           |           |           |
|           | range as  |           |           |           |           |
|           | configure |           |           |           |           |
|           | d         |           |           |           |           |
|           | in the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | broker    |           |           |           |           |
|           | configura |           |           |           |           |
|           | tion      |           |           |           |           |
|           | by        |           |           |           |           |
|           | ``group.m |           |           |           |           |
|           | in.sessio |           |           |           |           |
|           | n.timeout |           |           |           |           |
|           | .ms``     |           |           |           |           |
|           | and       |           |           |           |           |
|           | ``group.m |           |           |           |           |
|           | ax.sessio |           |           |           |           |
|           | n.timeout |           |           |           |           |
|           | .ms``.    |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| ssl.key.p | The       | password  | null      |           | high      |
| assword   | password  |           |           |           |           |
|           | of the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | private   |           |           |           |           |
|           | key in    |           |           |           |           |
|           | the key   |           |           |           |           |
|           | store     |           |           |           |           |
|           | file.     |           |           |           |           |
|           | This is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | optional  |           |           |           |           |
|           | for       |           |           |           |           |
|           | client.   |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| ssl.keyst | The       | string    | null      |           | high      |
| ore.locat | location  |           |           |           |           |
| ion       | of the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | key store |           |           |           |           |
|           | file.     |           |           |           |           |
|           | This is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | optional  |           |           |           |           |
|           | for       |           |           |           |           |
|           | client    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and can   |           |           |           |           |
|           | be used   |           |           |           |           |
|           | for       |           |           |           |           |
|           | two-way   |           |           |           |           |
|           | authentic |           |           |           |           |
|           | ation     |           |           |           |           |
|           | for       |           |           |           |           |
|           | client.   |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| ssl.keyst | The store | password  | null      |           | high      |
| ore.passw | password  |           |           |           |           |
| ord       | for the   |           |           |           |           |
|           | key store |           |           |           |           |
|           | file.     |           |           |           |           |
|           | This is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | optional  |           |           |           |           |
|           | for       |           |           |           |           |
|           | client    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and only  |           |           |           |           |
|           | needed if |           |           |           |           |
|           | ssl.keyst |           |           |           |           |
|           | ore.locat |           |           |           |           |
|           | ion       |           |           |           |           |
|           | is        |           |           |           |           |
|           | configure |           |           |           |           |
|           | d.        |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| ssl.trust | The       | string    | null      |           | high      |
| store.loc | location  |           |           |           |           |
| ation     | of the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | trust     |           |           |           |           |
|           | store     |           |           |           |           |
|           | file.     |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| ssl.trust | The       | password  | null      |           | high      |
| store.pas | password  |           |           |           |           |
| sword     | for the   |           |           |           |           |
|           | trust     |           |           |           |           |
|           | store     |           |           |           |           |
|           | file. If  |           |           |           |           |
|           | a         |           |           |           |           |
|           | password  |           |           |           |           |
|           | is not    |           |           |           |           |
|           | set       |           |           |           |           |
|           | access to |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | truststor |           |           |           |           |
|           | e         |           |           |           |           |
|           | is still  |           |           |           |           |
|           | available |           |           |           |           |
|           | ,         |           |           |           |           |
|           | but       |           |           |           |           |
|           | integrity |           |           |           |           |
|           | checking  |           |           |           |           |
|           | is        |           |           |           |           |
|           | disabled. |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| connectio | Close     | long      | 540000    |           | medium    |
| ns.max.id | idle      |           |           |           |           |
| le.ms     | connectio |           |           |           |           |
|           | ns        |           |           |           |           |
|           | after the |           |           |           |           |
|           | number of |           |           |           |           |
|           | milliseco |           |           |           |           |
|           | nds       |           |           |           |           |
|           | specified |           |           |           |           |
|           | by this   |           |           |           |           |
|           | config.   |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| receive.b | The size  | int       | 32768     | [0,...]   | medium    |
| uffer.byt | of the    |           |           |           |           |
| es        | TCP       |           |           |           |           |
|           | receive   |           |           |           |           |
|           | buffer    |           |           |           |           |
|           | (SO_RCVBU |           |           |           |           |
|           | F)        |           |           |           |           |
|           | to use    |           |           |           |           |
|           | when      |           |           |           |           |
|           | reading   |           |           |           |           |
|           | data. If  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the value |           |           |           |           |
|           | is -1,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | the OS    |           |           |           |           |
|           | default   |           |           |           |           |
|           | will be   |           |           |           |           |
|           | used.     |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| request.t | The       | int       | 40000     | [0,...]   | medium    |
| imeout.ms | configura |           |           |           |           |
|           | tion      |           |           |           |           |
|           | controls  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | maximum   |           |           |           |           |
|           | amount of |           |           |           |           |
|           | time the  |           |           |           |           |
|           | client    |           |           |           |           |
|           | will wait |           |           |           |           |
|           | for the   |           |           |           |           |
|           | response  |           |           |           |           |
|           | of a      |           |           |           |           |
|           | request.  |           |           |           |           |
|           | If the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | response  |           |           |           |           |
|           | is not    |           |           |           |           |
|           | received  |           |           |           |           |
|           | before    |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | timeout   |           |           |           |           |
|           | elapses   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | client    |           |           |           |           |
|           | will      |           |           |           |           |
|           | resend    |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | request   |           |           |           |           |
|           | if        |           |           |           |           |
|           | necessary |           |           |           |           |
|           | or fail   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | request   |           |           |           |           |
|           | if        |           |           |           |           |
|           | retries   |           |           |           |           |
|           | are       |           |           |           |           |
|           | exhausted |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| sasl.jaas | JAAS      | password  | null      |           | medium    |
| .config   | login     |           |           |           |           |
|           | context   |           |           |           |           |
|           | parameter |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | for SASL  |           |           |           |           |
|           | connectio |           |           |           |           |
|           | ns        |           |           |           |           |
|           | in the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | format    |           |           |           |           |
|           | used by   |           |           |           |           |
|           | JAAS      |           |           |           |           |
|           | configura |           |           |           |           |
|           | tion      |           |           |           |           |
|           | files.    |           |           |           |           |
|           | JAAS      |           |           |           |           |
|           | configura |           |           |           |           |
|           | tion      |           |           |           |           |
|           | file      |           |           |           |           |
|           | format is |           |           |           |           |
|           | described |           |           |           |           |
|           | `here <ht |           |           |           |           |
|           | tp://docs |           |           |           |           |
|           | .oracle.c |           |           |           |           |
|           | om/javase |           |           |           |           |
|           | /8/docs/t |           |           |           |           |
|           | echnotes/ |           |           |           |           |
|           | guides/se |           |           |           |           |
|           | curity/jg |           |           |           |           |
|           | ss/tutori |           |           |           |           |
|           | als/Login |           |           |           |           |
|           | ConfigFil |           |           |           |           |
|           | e.html>`_ |           |           |           |           |
|           | _.        |           |           |           |           |
|           | The       |           |           |           |           |
|           | format    |           |           |           |           |
|           | for the   |           |           |           |           |
|           | value is: |           |           |           |           |
|           | ' (=)*;'  |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| sasl.kerb | The       | string    | null      |           | medium    |
| eros.serv | Kerberos  |           |           |           |           |
| ice.name  | principal |           |           |           |           |
|           | name that |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka     |           |           |           |           |
|           | runs as.  |           |           |           |           |
|           | This can  |           |           |           |           |
|           | be        |           |           |           |           |
|           | defined   |           |           |           |           |
|           | either in |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka's   |           |           |           |           |
|           | JAAS      |           |           |           |           |
|           | config or |           |           |           |           |
|           | in        |           |           |           |           |
|           | Kafka's   |           |           |           |           |
|           | config.   |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| sasl.mech | SASL      | string    | GSSAPI    |           | medium    |
| anism     | mechanism |           |           |           |           |
|           | used for  |           |           |           |           |
|           | client    |           |           |           |           |
|           | connectio |           |           |           |           |
|           | ns.       |           |           |           |           |
|           | This may  |           |           |           |           |
|           | be any    |           |           |           |           |
|           | mechanism |           |           |           |           |
|           | for which |           |           |           |           |
|           | a         |           |           |           |           |
|           | security  |           |           |           |           |
|           | provider  |           |           |           |           |
|           | is        |           |           |           |           |
|           | available |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |
|           | GSSAPI is |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | default   |           |           |           |           |
|           | mechanism |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| security. | Protocol  | string    | PLAINTEXT |           | medium    |
| protocol  | used to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | communica |           |           |           |           |
|           | te        |           |           |           |           |
|           | with      |           |           |           |           |
|           | brokers.  |           |           |           |           |
|           | Valid     |           |           |           |           |
|           | values    |           |           |           |           |
|           | are:      |           |           |           |           |
|           | PLAINTEXT |           |           |           |           |
|           | ,         |           |           |           |           |
|           | SSL,      |           |           |           |           |
|           | SASL_PLAI |           |           |           |           |
|           | NTEXT,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | SASL_SSL. |           |           |           |           |

| send.buff | The size  | int       | 131072    | [0,...]   | medium    |
| er.bytes  | of the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | TCP send  |           |           |           |           |
|           | buffer    |           |           |           |           |
|           | (SO_SNDBU |           |           |           |           |
|           | F)        |           |           |           |           |
|           | to use    |           |           |           |           |
|           | when      |           |           |           |           |
|           | sending   |           |           |           |           |
|           | data. If  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the value |           |           |           |           |
|           | is -1,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | the OS    |           |           |           |           |
|           | default   |           |           |           |           |
|           | will be   |           |           |           |           |
|           | used.     |           |           |           |           |

|           | the key   |           |           |           |           |
|           | store     |           |           |           |           |
|           | file.     |           |           |           |           |
