| ssl.proto | The SSL   | string    | TLS       |           | medium    |
| col       | protocol  |           |           |           |           |
|           | used to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | generate  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | SSLContex |           |           |           |           |
|           | t.        |           |           |           |           |
|           | Default   |           |           |           |           |
|           | setting   |           |           |           |           |
|           | is TLS,   |           |           |           |           |
|           | which is  |           |           |           |           |
|           | fine for  |           |           |           |           |
|           | most      |           |           |           |           |
|           | cases.    |           |           |           |           |
|           | Allowed   |           |           |           |           |
|           | values in |           |           |           |           |
|           | recent    |           |           |           |           |
|           | JVMs are  |           |           |           |           |
|           | TLS,      |           |           |           |           |
|           | TLSv1.1   |           |           |           |           |
|           | and       |           |           |           |           |
|           | TLSv1.2.  |           |           |           |           |
|           | SSL,      |           |           |           |           |
|           | SSLv2 and |           |           |           |           |
|           | SSLv3 may |           |           |           |           |
|           | be        |           |           |           |           |
|           | supported |           |           |           |           |
|           | in older  |           |           |           |           |
|           | JVMs, but |           |           |           |           |
|           | their     |           |           |           |           |
|           | usage is  |           |           |           |           |
|           | discourag |           |           |           |           |
|           | ed        |           |           |           |           |
|           | due to    |           |           |           |           |
|           | known     |           |           |           |           |
|           | security  |           |           |           |           |
|           | vulnerabi |           |           |           |           |
|           | lities.   |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| ssl.provi | The name  | string    | null      |           | medium    |
| der       | of the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | security  |           |           |           |           |
|           | provider  |           |           |           |           |
|           | used for  |           |           |           |           |
|           | SSL       |           |           |           |           |
|           | connectio |           |           |           |           |
|           | ns.       |           |           |           |           |
|           | Default   |           |           |           |           |
|           | value is  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | default   |           |           |           |           |
|           | security  |           |           |           |           |
|           | provider  |           |           |           |           |
|           | of the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | JVM.      |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| ssl.trust | The file  | string    | JKS       |           | medium    |
| store.typ | format of |           |           |           |           |
| e         | the trust |           |           |           |           |
|           | store     |           |           |           |           |
|           | file.     |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| worker.sy | When the  | int       | 3000      |           | medium    |
| nc.timeou | worker is |           |           |           |           |
| t.ms      | out of    |           |           |           |           |
|           | sync with |           |           |           |           |
|           | other     |           |           |           |           |
|           | workers   |           |           |           |           |
|           | and needs |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | resynchro |           |           |           |           |
|           | nize      |           |           |           |           |
|           | configura |           |           |           |           |
|           | tions,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | wait up   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to this   |           |           |           |           |
|           | amount of |           |           |           |           |
|           | time      |           |           |           |           |
|           | before    |           |           |           |           |
|           | giving    |           |           |           |           |
|           | up,       |           |           |           |           |
|           | leaving   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | group,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | and       |           |           |           |           |
|           | waiting a |           |           |           |           |
|           | backoff   |           |           |           |           |
|           | period    |           |           |           |           |
|           | before    |           |           |           |           |
|           | rejoining |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| worker.un | When the  | int       | 300000    |           | medium    |
| sync.back | worker is |           |           |           |           |
| off.ms    | out of    |           |           |           |           |
|           | sync with |           |           |           |           |
|           | other     |           |           |           |           |
|           | workers   |           |           |           |           |
|           | and fails |           |           |           |           |
|           | to catch  |           |           |           |           |
|           | up within |           |           |           |           |
|           | worker.sy |           |           |           |           |
|           | nc.timeou |           |           |           |           |
|           | t.ms,     |           |           |           |           |
|           | leave the |           |           |           |           |
|           | Connect   |           |           |           |           |
|           | cluster   |           |           |           |           |
|           | for this  |           |           |           |           |
|           | long      |           |           |           |           |
|           | before    |           |           |           |           |
|           | rejoining |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| access.co | Sets the  | string    | ""        |           | low       |
| ntrol.all | methods   |           |           |           |           |
| ow.method | supported |           |           |           |           |
| s         | for cross |           |           |           |           |
|           | origin    |           |           |           |           |
|           | requests  |           |           |           |           |
|           | by        |           |           |           |           |
|           | setting   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | Access-Co |           |           |           |           |
|           | ntrol-All |           |           |           |           |
|           | ow-Method |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | header.   |           |           |           |           |
|           | The       |           |           |           |           |
|           | default   |           |           |           |           |
|           | value of  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | Access-Co |           |           |           |           |
|           | ntrol-All |           |           |           |           |
|           | ow-Method |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | header    |           |           |           |           |
|           | allows    |           |           |           |           |
|           | cross     |           |           |           |           |
|           | origin    |           |           |           |           |
|           | requests  |           |           |           |           |
|           | for GET,  |           |           |           |           |
|           | POST and  |           |           |           |           |
|           | HEAD.     |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| access.co | Value to  | string    | ""        |           | low       |
| ntrol.all | set the   |           |           |           |           |
| ow.origin | Access-Co |           |           |           |           |
|           | ntrol-All |           |           |           |           |
|           | ow-Origin |           |           |           |           |
|           | header to |           |           |           |           |
|           | for REST  |           |           |           |           |
|           | API       |           |           |           |           |
|           | requests. |           |           |           |           |
|           | To        |           |           |           |           |
|           | enable    |           |           |           |           |
|           | cross     |           |           |           |           |
|           | origin    |           |           |           |           |
|           | access,   |           |           |           |           |
|           | set this  |           |           |           |           |
|           | to the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | domain of |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | applicati |           |           |           |           |
|           | on        |           |           |           |           |
|           | that      |           |           |           |           |
|           | should be |           |           |           |           |
|           | permitted |           |           |           |           |
|           | to access |           |           |           |           |
|           | the API,  |           |           |           |           |
|           | or '*' to |           |           |           |           |
|           | allow     |           |           |           |           |
|           | access    |           |           |           |           |
|           | from any  |           |           |           |           |
|           | domain.   |           |           |           |           |
|           | The       |           |           |           |           |
|           | default   |           |           |           |           |
|           | value     |           |           |           |           |
|           | only      |           |           |           |           |
|           | allows    |           |           |           |           |
|           | access    |           |           |           |           |
|           | from the  |           |           |           |           |
|           | domain of |           |           |           |           |
|           | the REST  |           |           |           |           |
|           | API.      |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| client.id | An id     | string    | ""        |           | low       |
|           | string to |           |           |           |           |
|           | pass to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | server    |           |           |           |           |
|           | when      |           |           |           |           |
|           | making    |           |           |           |           |
|           | requests. |           |           |           |           |
|           | The       |           |           |           |           |
|           | purpose   |           |           |           |           |
|           | of this   |           |           |           |           |
|           | is to be  |           |           |           |           |
|           | able to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | track the |           |           |           |           |
|           | source of |           |           |           |           |
|           | requests  |           |           |           |           |
|           | beyond    |           |           |           |           |
|           | just      |           |           |           |           |
|           | ip/port   |           |           |           |           |
|           | by        |           |           |           |           |
|           | allowing  |           |           |           |           |
|           | a logical |           |           |           |           |
|           | applicati |           |           |           |           |
|           | on        |           |           |           |           |
|           | name to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | be        |           |           |           |           |
|           | included  |           |           |           |           |
|           | in        |           |           |           |           |
|           | server-si |           |           |           |           |
|           | de        |           |           |           |           |
|           | request   |           |           |           |           |
|           | logging.  |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| config.st | Replicati | short     | 3         | [1,...]   | low       |
| orage.rep | on        |           |           |           |           |
| lication. | factor    |           |           |           |           |
| factor    | used when |           |           |           |           |
|           | creating  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | configura |           |           |           |           |
|           | tion      |           |           |           |           |
|           | storage   |           |           |           |           |
|           | topic     |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| metadata. | The       | long      | 300000    | [0,...]   | low       |
| max.age.m | period of |           |           |           |           |
| s         | time in   |           |           |           |           |
|           | milliseco |           |           |           |           |
|           | nds       |           |           |           |           |
|           | after     |           |           |           |           |
|           | which we  |           |           |           |           |
|           | force a   |           |           |           |           |
|           | refresh   |           |           |           |           |
|           | of        |           |           |           |           |
|           | metadata  |           |           |           |           |
|           | even if   |           |           |           |           |
|           | we        |           |           |           |           |
|           | haven't   |           |           |           |           |
|           | seen any  |           |           |           |           |
|           | partition |           |           |           |           |
|           | leadershi |           |           |           |           |
|           | p         |           |           |           |           |
|           | changes   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | proactive |           |           |           |           |
|           | ly        |           |           |           |           |
|           | discover  |           |           |           |           |
|           | any new   |           |           |           |           |
|           | brokers   |           |           |           |           |
|           | or        |           |           |           |           |
|           | partition |           |           |           |           |
|           | s.        |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| metric.re | A list of | list      | ""        |           | low       |
| porters   | classes   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to use as |           |           |           |           |
|           | metrics   |           |           |           |           |
|           | reporters |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |
|           | Implement |           |           |           |           |
|           | ing       |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | ``org.apa |           |           |           |           |
|           | che.kafka |           |           |           |           |
|           | .common.m |           |           |           |           |
|           | etrics.Me |           |           |           |           |
|           | tricsRepo |           |           |           |           |
|           | rter``    |           |           |           |           |
|           | interface |           |           |           |           |
|           | allows    |           |           |           |           |
|           | plugging  |           |           |           |           |
|           | in        |           |           |           |           |
|           | classes   |           |           |           |           |
|           | that will |           |           |           |           |
|           | be        |           |           |           |           |
|           | notified  |           |           |           |           |
|           | of new    |           |           |           |           |
|           | metric    |           |           |           |           |
|           | creation. |           |           |           |           |
|           | The       |           |           |           |           |
|           | JmxReport |           |           |           |           |
|           | er        |           |           |           |           |
|           | is always |           |           |           |           |
|           | included  |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | register  |           |           |           |           |
|           | JMX       |           |           |           |           |
|           | statistic |           |           |           |           |
|           | s.        |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| metrics.n | The       | int       | 2         | [1,...]   | low       |
| um.sample | number of |           |           |           |           |
| s         | samples   |           |           |           |           |
|           | maintaine |           |           |           |           |
|           | d         |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | compute   |           |           |           |           |
|           | metrics.  |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| metrics.r | The       | string    | INFO      | [INFO,    | low       |
| ecording. | highest   |           |           | DEBUG]    |           |
| level     | recording |           |           |           |           |
|           | level for |           |           |           |           |
|           | metrics.  |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| metrics.s | The       | long      | 30000     | [0,...]   | low       |
| ample.win | window of |           |           |           |           |
| dow.ms    | time a    |           |           |           |           |
|           | metrics   |           |           |           |           |
|           | sample is |           |           |           |           |
|           | computed  |           |           |           |           |
|           | over.     |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| offset.fl | Interval  | long      | 60000     |           | low       |
| ush.inter | at which  |           |           |           |           |
| val.ms    | to try    |           |           |           |           |
|           | committin |           |           |           |           |
|           | g         |           |           |           |           |
|           | offsets   |           |           |           |           |
|           | for       |           |           |           |           |
|           | tasks.    |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| offset.fl | Maximum   | long      | 5000      |           | low       |
| ush.timeo | number of |           |           |           |           |
| ut.ms     | milliseco |           |           |           |           |
|           | nds       |           |           |           |           |
|           | to wait   |           |           |           |           |
|           | for       |           |           |           |           |
|           | records   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to flush  |           |           |           |           |
|           | and       |           |           |           |           |
|           | partition |           |           |           |           |
|           | offset    |           |           |           |           |
|           | data to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | be        |           |           |           |           |
|           | committed |           |           |           |           |
|           | to offset |           |           |           |           |
|           | storage   |           |           |           |           |
|           | before    |           |           |           |           |
|           | cancellin |           |           |           |           |
|           | g         |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | process   |           |           |           |           |
|           | and       |           |           |           |           |
|           | restoring |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | offset    |           |           |           |           |
|           | data to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | be        |           |           |           |           |
|           | committed |           |           |           |           |
|           | in a      |           |           |           |           |
|           | future    |           |           |           |           |
|           | attempt.  |           |           |           |           |

| offset.st | The       | int       | 25        | [1,...]   | low       |
| orage.par | number of |           |           |           |           |
| titions   | partition |           |           |           |           |
|           | s         |           |           |           |           |
|           | used when |           |           |           |           |
|           | creating  |           |           |           |           |

| offset.st | Replicati | short     | 3         | [1,...]   | low       |
| orage.rep | on        |           |           |           |           |
| lication. | factor    |           |           |           |           |
| factor    | used when |           |           |           |           |

|           | the       |           |           |           |           |

+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| plugin.pa | List of   | list      | null      |           | low       |
| th        | paths     |           |           |           |           |
|           | separated |           |           |           |           |
|           | by commas |           |           |           |           |
|           | (,) that  |           |           |           |           |
|           | contain   |           |           |           |           |
|           | plugins   |           |           |           |           |
|           | (connecto |           |           |           |           |
|           | rs,       |           |           |           |           |
|           | converter |           |           |           |           |
|           | s,        |           |           |           |           |
|           | transform |           |           |           |           |
|           | ations).  |           |           |           |           |
|           | The list  |           |           |           |           |
|           | should    |           |           |           |           |
|           | consist   |           |           |           |           |
|           | of top    |           |           |           |           |
|           | level     |           |           |           |           |
|           | directori |           |           |           |           |
|           | es        |           |           |           |           |
|           | that      |           |           |           |           |
|           | include   |           |           |           |           |
|           | any       |           |           |           |           |
|           | combinati |           |           |           |           |
|           | on        |           |           |           |           |
|           | of: a)    |           |           |           |           |
|           | directori |           |           |           |           |
|           | es        |           |           |           |           |
|           | immediate |           |           |           |           |
|           | ly        |           |           |           |           |
|           | containin |           |           |           |           |
|           | g         |           |           |           |           |
|           | jars with |           |           |           |           |
|           | plugins   |           |           |           |           |
|           | and their |           |           |           |           |
|           | dependenc |           |           |           |           |
|           | ies       |           |           |           |           |
|           | b)        |           |           |           |           |
|           | uber-jars |           |           |           |           |
|           | with      |           |           |           |           |
|           | plugins   |           |           |           |           |
|           | and their |           |           |           |           |
|           | dependenc |           |           |           |           |
|           | ies       |           |           |           |           |
|           | c)        |           |           |           |           |
|           | directori |           |           |           |           |
|           | es        |           |           |           |           |
|           | immediate |           |           |           |           |
|           | ly        |           |           |           |           |
|           | containin |           |           |           |           |
|           | g         |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | package   |           |           |           |           |
|           | directory |           |           |           |           |
|           | structure |           |           |           |           |
|           | of        |           |           |           |           |
|           | classes   |           |           |           |           |
|           | of        |           |           |           |           |
|           | plugins   |           |           |           |           |
|           | and their |           |           |           |           |
|           | dependenc |           |           |           |           |
|           | ies       |           |           |           |           |
|           | Note:     |           |           |           |           |
|           | symlinks  |           |           |           |           |
|           | will be   |           |           |           |           |
|           | followed  |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | discover  |           |           |           |           |
|           | dependenc |           |           |           |           |
|           | ies       |           |           |           |           |
|           | or        |           |           |           |           |
|           | plugins.  |           |           |           |           |
|           | Examples: |           |           |           |           |
|           | plugin.pa |           |           |           |           |
|           | th=/usr/l |           |           |           |           |
|           | ocal/shar |           |           |           |           |
|           | e/java,/u |           |           |           |           |
|           | sr/local/ |           |           |           |           |
|           | share/kaf |           |           |           |           |
|           | ka/plugin |           |           |           |           |
|           | s,/opt/co |           |           |           |           |
|           | nnectors  |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| reconnect | The       | long      | 1000      | [0,...]   | low       |
| .backoff. | maximum   |           |           |           |           |
| max.ms    | amount of |           |           |           |           |
|           | time in   |           |           |           |           |
|           | milliseco |           |           |           |           |
|           | nds       |           |           |           |           |
|           | to wait   |           |           |           |           |
|           | when      |           |           |           |           |
|           | reconnect |           |           |           |           |
|           | ing       |           |           |           |           |
|           | to a      |           |           |           |           |
|           | broker    |           |           |           |           |
|           | that has  |           |           |           |           |
|           | repeatedl |           |           |           |           |
|           | y         |           |           |           |           |
|           | failed to |           |           |           |           |
|           | connect.  |           |           |           |           |
|           | If        |           |           |           |           |
|           | provided, |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | backoff   |           |           |           |           |
|           | per host  |           |           |           |           |
|           | will      |           |           |           |           |
|           | increase  |           |           |           |           |
|           | exponenti |           |           |           |           |
|           | ally      |           |           |           |           |
|           | for each  |           |           |           |           |
|           | consecuti |           |           |           |           |
|           | ve        |           |           |           |           |
|           | connectio |           |           |           |           |
|           | n         |           |           |           |           |
|           | failure,  |           |           |           |           |
|           | up to     |           |           |           |           |
|           | this      |           |           |           |           |
|           | maximum.  |           |           |           |           |
|           | After     |           |           |           |           |
|           | calculati |           |           |           |           |
|           | ng        |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | backoff   |           |           |           |           |
|           | increase, |           |           |           |           |
|           | 20%       |           |           |           |           |
|           | random    |           |           |           |           |
|           | jitter is |           |           |           |           |
|           | added to  |           |           |           |           |
|           | avoid     |           |           |           |           |
|           | connectio |           |           |           |           |
|           | n         |           |           |           |           |
|           | storms.   |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| reconnect | The base  | long      | 50        | [0,...]   | low       |
| .backoff. | amount of |           |           |           |           |
| ms        | time to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | wait      |           |           |           |           |
|           | before    |           |           |           |           |
|           | attemptin |           |           |           |           |
|           | g         |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | reconnect |           |           |           |           |
|           | to a      |           |           |           |           |
|           | given     |           |           |           |           |
|           | host.     |           |           |           |           |
|           | This      |           |           |           |           |
|           | avoids    |           |           |           |           |
|           | repeatedl |           |           |           |           |
|           | y         |           |           |           |           |
|           | connectin |           |           |           |           |
|           | g         |           |           |           |           |
|           | to a host |           |           |           |           |
|           | in a      |           |           |           |           |
|           | tight     |           |           |           |           |
|           | loop.     |           |           |           |           |
|           | This      |           |           |           |           |
|           | backoff   |           |           |           |           |
|           | applies   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to all    |           |           |           |           |
|           | connectio |           |           |           |           |
|           | n         |           |           |           |           |
|           | attempts  |           |           |           |           |
|           | by the    |           |           |           |           |
|           | client to |           |           |           |           |
|           | a broker. |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| rest.adve | If this   | string    | null      |           | low       |
| rtised.ho | is set,   |           |           |           |           |
| st.name   | this is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | hostname  |           |           |           |           |
|           | that will |           |           |           |           |
|           | be given  |           |           |           |           |
|           | out to    |           |           |           |           |
|           | other     |           |           |           |           |
|           | workers   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | connect   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to.       |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| rest.adve | If this   | int       | null      |           | low       |
| rtised.po | is set,   |           |           |           |           |
| rt        | this is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the port  |           |           |           |           |
|           | that will |           |           |           |           |
|           | be given  |           |           |           |           |
|           | out to    |           |           |           |           |
|           | other     |           |           |           |           |
|           | workers   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | connect   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to.       |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| rest.host | Hostname  | string    | null      |           | low       |
| .name     | for the   |           |           |           |           |
|           | REST API. |           |           |           |           |
|           | If this   |           |           |           |           |
|           | is set,   |           |           |           |           |
|           | it will   |           |           |           |           |
|           | only bind |           |           |           |           |
|           | to this   |           |           |           |           |
|           | interface |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| rest.port | Port for  | int       | 8083      |           | low       |
|           | the REST  |           |           |           |           |
|           | API to    |           |           |           |           |
|           | listen    |           |           |           |           |
|           | on.       |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| retry.bac | The       | long      | 100       | [0,...]   | low       |
| koff.ms   | amount of |           |           |           |           |
|           | time to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | wait      |           |           |           |           |
|           | before    |           |           |           |           |
|           | attemptin |           |           |           |           |
|           | g         |           |           |           |           |
|           | to retry  |           |           |           |           |
|           | a failed  |           |           |           |           |
|           | request   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to a      |           |           |           |           |
|           | given     |           |           |           |           |
|           | topic     |           |           |           |           |
|           | partition |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |
|           | This      |           |           |           |           |
|           | avoids    |           |           |           |           |
|           | repeatedl |           |           |           |           |
|           | y         |           |           |           |           |
|           | sending   |           |           |           |           |
|           | requests  |           |           |           |           |
|           | in a      |           |           |           |           |
|           | tight     |           |           |           |           |
|           | loop      |           |           |           |           |
|           | under     |           |           |           |           |
|           | some      |           |           |           |           |
|           | failure   |           |           |           |           |
|           | scenarios |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| sasl.kerb | Kerberos  | string    | /usr/bin/ |           | low       |
| eros.kini | kinit     |           | kinit     |           |           |
| t.cmd     | command   |           |           |           |           |
|           | path.     |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| sasl.kerb | Login     | long      | 60000     |           | low       |
| eros.min. | thread    |           |           |           |           |
| time.befo | sleep     |           |           |           |           |
| re.relogi | time      |           |           |           |           |
| n         | between   |           |           |           |           |
|           | refresh   |           |           |           |           |
|           | attempts. |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| sasl.kerb | Percentag | double    | 0.05      |           | low       |
| eros.tick | e         |           |           |           |           |
| et.renew. | of random |           |           |           |           |
| jitter    | jitter    |           |           |           |           |
|           | added to  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | renewal   |           |           |           |           |
|           | time.     |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| sasl.kerb | Login     | double    | 0.8       |           | low       |
| eros.tick | thread    |           |           |           |           |
| et.renew. | will      |           |           |           |           |
| window.fa | sleep     |           |           |           |           |
| ctor      | until the |           |           |           |           |
|           | specified |           |           |           |           |
|           | window    |           |           |           |           |
|           | factor of |           |           |           |           |
|           | time from |           |           |           |           |
|           | last      |           |           |           |           |
|           | refresh   |           |           |           |           |
|           | to        |           |           |           |           |
|           | ticket's  |           |           |           |           |
|           | expiry    |           |           |           |           |
|           | has been  |           |           |           |           |
|           | reached,  |           |           |           |           |
|           | at which  |           |           |           |           |
|           | time it   |           |           |           |           |
|           | will try  |           |           |           |           |
|           | to renew  |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | ticket.   |           |           |           |           |
+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+-----------+
| ssl.ciphe | A list of | list      | null      |           | low       |

|           | suites.   |           |           |           |           |
|           | This is a |           |           |           |           |
|           | named     |           |           |           |           |
|           | combinati |           |           |           |           |
|           | on        |           |           |           |           |
|           | of        |           |           |           |           |
|           | authentic |           |           |           |           |
|           | ation,    |           |           |           |           |
|           | encryptio |           |           |           |           |
|           | n,        |           |           |           |           |
|           | MAC and   |           |           |           |           |
|           | key       |           |           |           |           |
|           | exchange  |           |           |           |           |
|           | algorithm |           |           |           |           |
|           | used to   |           |           |           |           |
|           | negotiate |           |           |           |           |
|           | the       |           |           |           |           |
|           | security  |           |           |           |           |
|           | settings  |           |           |           |           |
|           | for a     |           |           |           |           |
|           | network   |           |           |           |           |
|           | connectio |           |           |           |           |
|           | n         |           |           |           |           |
|           | using TLS |           |           |           |           |
|           | or SSL    |           |           |           |           |
|           | network   |           |           |           |           |
|           | protocol. |           |           |           |           |
|           | By        |           |           |           |           |
|           | default   |           |           |           |           |
|           | all the   |           |           |           |           |
|           | available |           |           |           |           |
|           | cipher    |           |           |           |           |
|           | suites    |           |           |           |           |
|           | are       |           |           |           |           |
|           | supported |           |           |           |           |
|           | .         |           |           |           |           |

| task.shut | Amount of | long      | 5000      |           | low       |
| down.grac | time to   |           |           |           |           |
| eful.time | wait for  |           |           |           |           |
| out.ms    | tasks to  |           |           |           |           |
|           | shutdown  |           |           |           |           |
|           | gracefull |           |           |           |           |
|           | y.        |           |           |           |           |
|           | This is   |           |           |           |           |
|           | the total |           |           |           |           |
|           | amount of |           |           |           |           |
|           | time, not |           |           |           |           |
|           | per task. |           |           |           |           |
|           | All task  |           |           |           |           |
|           | have      |           |           |           |           |
|           | shutdown  |           |           |           |           |
|           | triggered |           |           |           |           |
|           | ,         |           |           |           |           |
|           | then they |           |           |           |           |
|           | are       |           |           |           |           |
|           | waited on |           |           |           |           |
|           | sequentia |           |           |           |           |
|           | lly.      |           |           |           |           |
